logicalTable.name: F0 Sales Base Measures
logicalTable.description:
This logical table contains metrics like Revenue, Billed Qty, Booked Amt and Booked Qty with different types of aggregation like Sum, First on Time , Last on Time and Count Distinct. 
All the metrics in this table are physically mapped to columns in the Revenue fact table.

logicalColumns.name: 1 ==== Revenue Base Metrics ========
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

logicalColumns.name: 1- Revenue
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Dollars physical column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F10 Billed Rev.Revenue
physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F20 Rev\. (Aggregate 1).Revenue
physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F21 Rev\. (Aggregate 2).Revenue
physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F22 Rev\. (Bridged to Channels).Revenue
physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F10 Billed Rev.Revenue

logicalColumns.name: 2- Billed Quantity
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Billed Quantity data. Sources from Units column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F10 Billed Rev.Units

physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F10 Billed Rev.Units

physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F10 Billed Rev.Discnt_Value

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

logicalColumns.name: 7- Shipped Amount

Booked Amount data. Sources from Dollars column in FactsRev table joining to time using Booked time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F14 Rev\. (Ship Dt Join).Revenue

logicalColumns.name: 7- Shipped Quantity
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Billed Quantity data. Sources from Units column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F13 Rev\. (Order Dt Join).Revenue

logicalColumns.description:

Billed Quantity data. Sources from Units column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate:
case when 
 %1 =0 
then 
%2

when 
 %1 is null
then 
%2
end
expressionObjects: physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.D51 Closure Table Sales Rep Parent Child.Distance
physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F18 Rev\. (Individual Contrib).Revenue

logicalColumns.name: 115  Peers Rev  (Sum Siblings)
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Dollars physical column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

logicalColumns.name: 116  Team Rev  (Sum All)

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F16 Rev\. (Team Agg).Revenue

logicalColumns.name: 117  Unbound Rolling Rev  (Alias Based)
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Dollars physical column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Sum of the metric values starting the current period to all the periods in history available in the database.

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F12 Rev\. (Rolling).Revenue

logicalColumns.name: 120  Converted Rev  (Indexcol)
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Dollars physical column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: INDEXCOL( CASE  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%1) WHEN 'USD' THEN 0 WHEN 'EUR' THEN 1 WHEN 'AUD' THEN 2 END , %2, %3, %4)
expressionObjects: variable:DUAL Currency (=USD).PREFERRED_CURRENCY
physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F19 Rev\. (Converted).Revenue_Usd
physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F19 Rev\. (Converted).Revenue_Eur
physicalColumn:01 - Sample App Data (ORCL).BISAMPLE.F19 Rev\. (Converted).Revenue_Aud

logicalColumns.name: 121  Preserve Dim Members
logicalColumns.description:
Help :
Revenue data. Sources from Dollars physical column in FactsRev table joining to time using Billed time.  

- Returns sum of data over any selected dimensions

logicalHierarchies.name: H0 Time [branch at level 'Month']
logicalHierarchies.description:
Time Dimension : 
Type - Time. 
Includes two drill paths: Fiscal Year and Year. 
Both the paths include levels Year->Half->Qtr->Month->Week->Day

logicalHierarchies.name: H0 Time [branch at level 'Fiscal Month']
logicalHierarchies.description:
Time Dimension : 
Type - Time. 
Includes two drill paths: Fiscal Year and Year. 
Both the paths include levels Year->Half->Qtr->Month->Week->Day
